name: Twenty38
description:
This game is an early concept for a future game. Based around a dystopian futuristic city that is set in a world that is slowly falling to pieces. The first level is set in the slums of the city, which is made up of the old world remnants. Use these buildings to obtain the objects and make it to the end of the level.

Objective:

Collect the 4 objects then proceed to the end of the level.

Controls:

Movement - Arrow Keys

Jump - Space

Crouch - Ctrl (Hold to drop through platforms)

Menu - Esc

All feedback is much appreciated as this is a concept build and would like any tips or things you'd like to see added.
